definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To offer pharmacy consultation to patients and hospital staff in out-patient department.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲醫院門診患者及醫務人員提供藥物信息服務。

sentences.english: Doctors are developing artificial wombs in which embryos can grow outside a woman's body.
sentences.chinese: 醫務人員正在研製人造子宮，實現胚胎體外生長。

sentences.english: We're in bad need of medical workers, especially surgeons.
sentences.chinese: 這裏最需要醫務人員，特別是外科醫生。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of six-step hand-washing method adopted by health care workers(HCWs).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察臨牀醫務人員採用六步洗手法洗手效果。

sentences.english: Paramedics unbolted the toilet seat, and while wheeling a "frightened and humiliated" Dougherty out of the store, he passed out.
sentences.chinese: 爲了解救多爾蒂，醫務人員把馬桶從底座上卸了下來。

sentences.english: Practitioners may not be certified or licensed.
sentences.chinese: 傳統醫務人員可能未獲認證，或無照行醫。

sentences.english: WHO is totally opposed to FGM being carried out by medical personnel.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織堅決反對由醫務人員進行女性生殖器切割。

sentences.english: I've learned that it is better to communicate with the coaches and the medical staff.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，經常跟教練還有醫務人員保持聯繫會更好。

sentences.english: Result Knowledge of hand hygiene of medical personnel was adequate, but the implementation rate of hand-washing was low.
sentences.chinese: 結果醫務人員手衛生知識掌握尚可，但洗手執行率低。

sentences.english: Many medical staff are in essence unsackable civil servants.
sentences.chinese: 許多醫務人員實質上是不能解僱的公務員。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To survey on the oriteria of intestinal flora of medical personnel.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查醫務人員腸道微生態菌羣。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mental health of grass roots medical staffs in Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討甘肅省基層醫務人員的心理健康狀況。

sentences.english: All the medical volunteers for the Expo can speak good english.
sentences.chinese: 所有爲世博會志願工作的醫務人員都能講流利的英語。

sentences.english: No medical worker is allowed to prescribe any narcotic drug for him/herself.
sentences.chinese: 醫務人員不得爲自己開處方使用麻醉藥品。

sentences.english: The burning rod is a bending shape, which can not block the vision of the medical staff when being held by hand.
sentences.chinese: 烙杆作成彎形避免手握時，擋住醫務人員的視線。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To know the compliance and it′s impact factors of hand hygiene of healthcare workers.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解醫務人員手衛生依從性及合格率的影響因素。

definition: waiting to see a doctor/awaiting treatment
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
